errors.error_description: Incorrect installation order - installing pip dependencies before creating and activating virtual environment
correction_candidates: To set up NetBox, first create a virtual environment with `python -m venv netbox_env`, then activate it using `source netbox_env/bin/activate`, and finally install pip dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

To set up NetBox, first create a virtual environment with `python -m venv netbox_env`, activate it using `source netbox_env/bin/activate`, then install pip dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

To set up NetBox, create a virtual environment with `python -m venv netbox_env`, then activate it using `source netbox_env/bin/activate`, and install pip dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

To set up NetBox, first install Python, then create a virtual environment with `python -m venv netbox_env`, activate it using `source netbox_env/bin/activate`, and install pip dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: To set up NetBox, first create a virtual environment with `python -m venv netbox_env`, then activate it using `source netbox_env/bin/activate`, and finally install pip dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

errors.error_description: Specifies outdated Django 2.2 version requirement when NetBox requires Django 4.2+
correction_candidates: NetBox requires Django version 4.2 or later to function properly with all its features.

errors.golden_answer: NetBox requires Django version 4.2 or later to function properly with all its features.
